actions.code: await expect(page.getByRole('checkbox', { name: '❯Mark all as complete' })).toBeVisible();
actions.intent: Verify that the 'Mark all as complete' checkbox is visible to confirm expectation.

actions.code:
await page.getByRole('textbox', { name: 'What needs to be done?' }).fill('Buy groceries');
await page.keyboard.press('Enter');
actions.intent: Add new todo item called 'Buy groceries' to the list.

actions.code: await page.getByRole('textbox', { name: 'What needs to be done?' }).click();
actions.intent: Click inside the 'What needs to be done?' input field to focus it and allow user input.

actions.code: await expect(page.getByText('1 item left')).toBeVisible();
actions.intent: Assert that the counter displays '1 item left' to confirm the correct state.

actions.code: await expect(page.getByRole('textbox', { name: 'What needs to be done?' })).toHaveValue('');
actions.intent: Verify the input field is cleared and ready for next entry by asserting its value is empty.

actions.code:
await expect(page.locator('body')).toMatchAria(`
- list:
  - listitem: Buy groceries
`);
actions.intent: Assert that the todo item 'Buy groceries' appears in the list on the page, ensuring the expected task is present.

actions.code:

await page.keyboard.press('Enter');
actions.intent: Add the todo item 'Buy groceries' by typing it into the new todo textbox and submitting.

actions.code:

await page.keyboard.press('Enter');

actions.code:
await page.getByRole('textbox', { name: 'What needs to be done?' }).fill('Walk the dog');
await page.keyboard.press('Enter');
actions.intent: Add a new todo item 'Walk the dog' by typing it into the main input box and submitting.

actions.template:
- list:
  - listitem: Buy groceries
  - listitem: Walk the dog
  - listitem: Read a book
actions.code:
await expect(page.locator('body')).toMatchAria(`
- list:
  - listitem: Buy groceries
  - listitem: Walk the dog
  - listitem: Read a book
`);
actions.intent: Verify all three todos appear in the list in order of creation: 'Buy groceries', 'Walk the dog', 'Read a book'.

actions.code: await expect(page.getByText('3 items left')).toBeVisible();
actions.intent: Verify that the counter displays the plural form '3 items left' as expected.

actions.code: await expect(page.getByRole('listitem').filter({ hasText: 'Buy groceries' }).getByLabel('Toggle Todo')).toBeChecked({ checked: false });
actions.intent:
Assert that the checkbox for the 'Buy groceries' todo is unchecked, confirming the todo's active status.
Assert that the checkbox for the 'Walk the dog' todo is unchecked, confirming the todo's active status.
Assert that the checkbox for the 'Read a book' todo is unchecked, confirming the todo's active status.

actions.text: This is a very long todo item to test the character limit and see how the application handles extremely long text inputs that might break the layout or cause other issues

await page.keyboard.press('Enter');
